about_the_game:
A tiny turn-based tactical... soulslike! Explore a twisty, interconnected world, battle enemies using a unique spin on a 'posture' system, and employ various upgrades to your advantage.

Turn-Based Soulslike Combat

Alternate turns with enemies in turn-based combat with a unique posture system. You have the option to attack directly, but can also deal damage by knocking enemies out of position, into walls, or even blocking their movement with your own body.

Countless Combinations of Items

Unlock and discover equippable "toolsets" granting special abilities, "modules" to give various passive boosts, and weapons with unique shapes and hidden qualities.  Customize your build as you explore and fight through the challenging terrain.

A Twisty World

Explore six distinct zones through a sprawling, highly (and unpredictably) interconnected world.  Unlock shortcuts, double back to find secrets of challenge difficult enemies, and uncover the hidden depths of this tiny but intricate world.

Features

  • Master the unique turn-based combat by breaking enemy posture “buffer”

  • Untangle the dense, interconnected world with branching paths and unlockable shortcuts

  • Fight against unique roster of enemies, mini-bosses and bosses

  • Equip a variety of weapons and activatable “toolsets” to manipulate enemy positions and turn order

  • Upgrade your character’s core stats and discover equippable “modules” to give you special passive bonuses

  • Explore a vibrant and atmospheric 16-color environments
